name: Sunny Starr
personality: A big-haired, neon-loving L.A. promoter who practically invented the pop star launch party. She’s always wearing sunglasses, even indoors, and promises to make every show 'a night of pure magic, babe!'

name: Vinny Velour
personality: The king of glam pop, Vinny’s suits are as shiny as his personality. Known for his catchphrase, 'Let’s make you a legend, darling,' he can make or break a star with the snap of his fingers.

name: Trixie Fox
personality: An edgy critic with a punk streak, Trixie has a soft spot for rebellious pop divas. She’s known for her scathing reviews of anything too 'mainstream,' but appreciates a pop star with 'real grit.'

name: Cherie Heart
personality: The bubbly girl-next-door of the Miami pop scene, Cherie is all about glitter, pink lip gloss, and high-energy dance numbers. She’ll play nice, but everyone knows she’s eyeing that top spot on the charts.

name: Buzz Branson
personality: Editor of *Pop Stop Magazine*, Buzz has a nose for scandal and a love for drama. He’s always on the lookout for the next juicy story and is notorious for his 'exclusive exposés' on rising stars.

name: Jill Jagger
personality: Editor of the local newsweekly, Jill loves giving local artists a platform.

name: Misty Mirage
personality: With hair as big as her Rolodex, Misty’s known for spotting pop talent that 'speaks to the heart.' She’s got a soft spot for retro sounds and is known for her slow, dramatic Southern drawl.

name: Johnny Glitz
personality: A Las Vegas promoter with a love for flashy lights and flashy deals. Known for his sequined jackets and loud laugh, Johnny’s shows may not be the classiest, but they pack the house every time.

name: Velvet Monroe
personality: Velvet’s reviews are as smooth as her name. Known for her smoky voice and love for anything 'new wave,' she’s always on the lookout for artists with style and mystique.

name: Marilyn Martin
personality: Marilyn is a big-time events planner who loves to throw lavish parties and gala fundraisers.
